headline: AIG Appoints Christopher Schaper Chief Risk Officer
summary: NEW YORK, November 12, 2024--American International Group, Inc. (NYSE: AIG) today announced that Christopher Schaper has been appointed Chief Risk Officer of AIG, effective immediately. Mr. Schaper will continue to report to Peter Zaffino, AIG Chairman & Chief Executive Officer and will continue to serve on AIG’s Executive Leadership Team.
